review_title: Horrible place to work due to management
pros:
Some of the co-workers and various departments are helpful, friendly and professional.
On occasion they have staff appreciation meals which can be enjoyable.
cons:
Management in Surgical Services extremely unprofessional, vindictive and exhibits Bipolar behavior.
Rules with an iron fist and forever moving goal posts so you don't know where you stand.
One day you're doing fine and the next day you are the biggest screw up in the building.
Atmosphere oppressive and punitive. Coworkers scared to make a mistake.
Management encourages tattle tailing  and bad mouthing.
